revised_title: Correction of Statement in the Note on the Electromotive Properties of Muscle
tldr: Dr. Burdon Sanderson corrects a misstatement in his previous note regarding the electromotive properties of the gastrocnemius muscle. He acknowledges Prof. du Bois-Reymond's explanation of these properties, which he initially misunderstood, and apologizes for the misrepresentation of du Bois-Reymond's views.
